title: How should I complete my class 11 syllabus in just 5 months and from where? - Quora

response.answer_text: Set aside a time slot to study everyday. Self study is the new mantra in this digital world. Search Google for answers to the questions you find you cannot do on your own. Stay focused and you can ace your exams in 5 months. People do wonders in two months as well. You still have 5 months. Nothing is lost…keep a routine..devote reasonable hours to your self study. All the best.
With the help of YouTube you can complete your syllabus, on YouTube there is so many channels which provides full course subjects wise.
